name: Requiem (itch) (ainsley)
description:
Notes:

  • Move the cursor to the edges of the screen to move the camera.
  • The button that appears on the second instrument is interactable.

How to read tablature:

  • Each line represents a string. The bottom line is the left-most string and the top is the right-most.
  • Dots on a line represent a note, read the tablature from left to right.
